summary: THE DRIVER'S SEAT BELT HOUSING ATTACHMENT BLOCKED THE VIEW FROM THE WINDOW WHEN TRYING TO OVERCOME BLIND SPOT.  THE BELT HOUSING ATTACHMENT TO THE VEHICLE'S FRAME WAS VERY WIDE.   THE WINDOWS GLASS ALSO SEEMED DIFFICULT TO SEE THROUGH.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TOT HE DEALER AND WAS TRADED IN FOR ANOTHER VEHICLE.  *JB   *NLM
